reviews.review_msg: He is so lovely. Really patient to interpret to you even though you give him a stupid question. I took CHEM 121, 122, and 126 with him. Best professor ever. Taking class with him if you are able to do so. I am stupid so I need textbook sometimes, but every thing you need to know is inside his note and LONCAPA

Really awesome prof. Not intimidating like others. Very helpful during labs... doesn't make you feel stupid for asking a question. Exams are fair... he tells you what to study and what not to. Overall a really good prof!
